title: Entity Schema
description: An entity in your system: https://manifest.build/docs/entities

className.description: The class name. Used widely on the admin panel. Default: class name.

nameSingular.description: The singular lowercase name of your entity. Used widely on the admin panel. Default: singular lowercase name.

namePlural.description: The plural lowercase name of your entity. Used widely on the admin panel. Default: plural lowercase name.

slug.description: The kebab-case slug of the entity that will define API endpoints. Default: plural dasherized name.

mainProp.description: The main prop of the entity. Used widely on the admin panel. Default: first string field.

seedCount.description: The number of entities to seed when running the seed command. Default: 50.

authenticable.description: Whether the entity is authenticable. Doc: https://manifest.build/docs/auth

single.description: Whether the entity is a single type instead of a collection. Doc: https://manifest.build/docs/entities#singles

properties.description: The properties of the entity. Doc: https://manifest.build/docs/entities

belongsTo.description: The ManyToOne relationships of the entity. Doc: https://manifest.build/docs/relations

belongsToMany.description: The ManyToMany relationships of the entity. Doc: https://manifest.build/docs/relations

policies.description: The policies of the entity. Doc: https://manifest.build/docs/policies

validation.description: Validation object for the properties. Doc: https://manifest.build/docs/validation
